trans-unit.source: Represents a standard Windows track bar.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma barra de controlar Windows padrão.

trans-unit.source: The TrackBar is a scrollable control similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: TrackBar é um controlo deslocável semelhante para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: You can configure ranges through which the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> property of a track bar scrolls by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> property to specify the lower end of the range and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> property to specify the upper end of the range.
trans-unit.target: Pode configurar os intervalos de através do qual o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>propriedade de uma barra de controlar desloca definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade para especificar o final do intervalo inferior e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade para especificar o final do intervalo superior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.LargeChange%2A> property defines the increment to add or subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> property when clicks occur on either side of the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.LargeChange%2A>propriedade define o incremento para adicionar ou subtrair a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>propriedade quando clica em ocorre em ambos os lados da caixa de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.LargeChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The track bar can be displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: É possível apresentar a barra de controlar horizontal ou verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: You can use this control to input numeric data obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este controlo para dados numéricos obtidos através de entrada a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display this numeric data in a control or use it in code.
trans-unit.target: Pode apresentar estes dados numéricos num controlo ou utilizá-lo em código.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> is created with a default horizontal orientation and a range of 0 to 10, with a tick mark shown for every value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>é criada com uma orientação de horizontal predefinido e um intervalo de 0 a 10, com uma marca de escala a apresentar para cada valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a altura ou a largura da barra de controlar está a ser dimensionada automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AutoSize property to `true` to cause the track bar to adjust its height (if horizontally aligned) or width (if vertically aligned).
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade AutoSize `true` para fazer com que a barra de controlar para ajustar a altura (se horizontalmente alinhadas) ou a largura (se verticalmente alinhadas).

trans-unit.source: The height or width is adjusted to a standard size based on the screen resolution on which the track bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A largura ou altura é ajustada para um tamanho padrão com base na resolução de ecrã em que a barra de controlar é apresentada.

trans-unit.source: Set the AutoSize property to `false` if you want to adjust the size yourself.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AutoSize como `false` se pretender ajustar o tamanho por si.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a barra de controlar está a ser dimensionada automaticamente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.AutoSize*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImage property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackgroundImage não tem qualquer efeito no aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlar; por conseguinte, está oculto no designer e do IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> que está a imagem de fundo para a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage%2A>propriedade não tem qualquer efeito no aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlar; por conseguinte, está oculto no designer e do IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value; however, setting this property has no effect on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valor; no entanto, a definição desta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackgroundImageLayout property will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, this property is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: A definição da propriedade BackgroundImageLayout não tem qualquer efeito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlar; por conseguinte, esta propriedade não é apresentada no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, this property is no shown in the designer or by Intellisense.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>propriedade não tem qualquer efeito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlo; por conseguinte, esta propriedade não é apresentado no designer ou por Intellisense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> que é utilizada num formulário ou utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização ocorre em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] design ambiente utiliza este método para iniciar a inicialização de um componente que é utilizada num formulário ou a ser utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A>método termina a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A>métodos impede que o controlo a ser utilizada antes de ser completamente inicializada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams*> property.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the mode for the Input Method Editor (IME) for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o modo de entrada método Editor (IME) para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default width is 104 pixels; the height will vary.
trans-unit.target: A largura predefinida é 104 pixéis; a altura variam.

trans-unit.source: You can override this property in a derived class to provide a different default size.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir esta propriedade de uma classe derivada para fornecer um tamanho predefinido diferente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker; however, this property has no effect on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este controlo deve redesenhar a superfície de utilização de uma memória intermédia secundária para reduzir ou impedir flicker; No entanto, esta propriedade não tem efeito <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlar; por conseguinte, não é apresentada no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo tem uma memória intermédia secundária; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> que é utilizada num formulário ou utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização ocorre em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] design ambiente utiliza este método para terminar a inicialização de um componente que é utilizada num formulário ou a ser utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A>método inicia a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A>e métodos de EndInit impede que o controlo a ser utilizada antes de ser completamente inicializada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>
trans-unit.target: Substituições<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto apresentado pelo controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Font*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Font*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Font*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the track bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de primeiro plano da barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ForeColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ForeColor*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de método de entrada Editor (IME) suportado por este controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ImeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ImeMode*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*> property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor a ser adicionados ou subtraído o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>propriedade quando a caixa de deslocamento é movido uma distância grande.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the scroll box, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> property changes according to the value set in the LargeChange property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador premir a tecla PAGE UP ou PAGE DOWN ou clica a barra de controlar em ambos os lados da caixa de deslocamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>alterações de propriedades de acordo com o valor definido na propriedade LargeChange.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You might consider setting the LargeChange value to a percentage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> (for a vertically oriented track bar) or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> (for a horizontally oriented track bar) value.
trans-unit.target: Poderá considerar definindo o valor de LargeChange como uma percentagem do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>(para uma barra de controlar verticalmente orientado por) ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>(para uma barra de controlar horizontalmente orientado por) valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
trans-unit.target: Este procedimento mantém a distância que da barra de controlar move proporcional ao tamanho.

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor numérico.

trans-unit.source: The default is 5.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 5.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper limit of the range this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> is working with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite superior do intervalo isto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> está a trabalhar com.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A> method to set both the Maximum and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> properties at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A>método para definir o número de máximo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>propriedades ao mesmo tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor máximo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower limit of the range this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> is working with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite inferior do intervalo isto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> está a trabalhar com.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A> method to set both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> and Minimum properties at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A>método para definir ambas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>e mínimo propriedades ao mesmo tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.SetRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor mínimo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Scroll"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the OnScroll event to update other controls as the position of the scroll box changes.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o evento de OnScroll atualizar outros controlos como a posição das alterações de caixa de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnScroll method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnScroll também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SystemColorsChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The control will redraw when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: O controlo será redesenhar quando alterar as cores do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnSystemColorsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnSystemColorsChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ValueChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.ValueChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a orientação horizontal ou vertical da barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: When the Orientation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>, the scroll box moves from left to right as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> increases.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de orientação é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>, a caixa de deslocamento é movido da esquerda para a direita como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>aumenta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the Orientation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>, the scroll box moves from bottom to top as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> increases.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de orientação é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>, a caixa de deslocamento se move de inferior à parte superior, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>aumenta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço entre as extremidades de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo e o respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The Padding property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Padding não tem qualquer efeito no aspecto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>controlar; por conseguinte, está oculto no designer e do IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Padding*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Padding*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo é desenhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> will be laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> será dispostos da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeftLayout é é utilizada com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>propriedade para aplicações internacionais onde o idioma é escrito da direita para a esquerda, tais como hebraico ou árabe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> are laid out from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> são dispostos partir da direita para esquerda; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.RightToLeftLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.RightToLeftLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: Exemplo

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when either a mouse or keyboard action moves the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um rato ou o teclado ação move a caixa de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: Efetua o trabalho de definição de limites especificados deste controlo.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum and maximum values for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores mínimos e máximo para uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to set the entire range for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para definir o intervalo completo para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>ao mesmo tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: To set the minimum or maximum values individually, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para definir os valores mínimo ou máximos individualmente, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `minValue` parameter is greater than the `maxValue` parameter, `maxValue` is set equal to `minValue`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `minValue` parâmetro é maior do que o `maxValue` parâmetro `maxValue` está definido igual a `minValue`.

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the range of the track bar.
trans-unit.target: O limite inferior do intervalo da barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the range of the track bar.
trans-unit.target: O limite superior do intervalo da barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*> property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor adicionados ou subtraído o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>propriedade quando a caixa de deslocamento é movido uma distância pequena.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> property changes according to the value set in the SmallChange property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador prime um as teclas de seta de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>alterações de propriedades de acordo com o valor definido na propriedade SmallChange.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You might consider setting the value of SmallChange to a percentage of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> (for a vertically oriented track bar) or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> (for a horizontally oriented track bar) property.
trans-unit.target: Pode considerar a definição do valor de SmallChange para uma percentagem do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>(para uma barra de controlar verticalmente orientado por) ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>(para uma barra de controlar horizontalmente orientado por) propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: This sets the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size.
trans-unit.target: Isto define a distância que da barra de controlar move proporcional ao tamanho.

trans-unit.source: A numeric value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor numérico.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 1.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não é relevante para esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Text*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica as diferenças entre os batimentos desenhada no controlo.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar> with a large range of values between the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> properties, it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>com uma grande variedade de valores entre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>Propriedades, poderá ser impractical para desenhar os batimentos serão para os valores no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of 5 here causes the control to draw 20 ticks.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver um controlo com um intervalo de 100, transmitir um valor de 5 aqui faz com que o controlo desenhar 20 ticks.

trans-unit.source: In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, cada marcas de escala representa cinco unidades no intervalo de valores.

trans-unit.source: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks.
trans-unit.target: O valor numérico que representa as diferenças entre os batimentos.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how to display the tick marks on the track bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como apresentar as marcas de escala na barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: You can use the TickStyle property to modify the manner in which the tick marks are displayed on the track bar.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade TickStyle para modificar a forma no qual as marcas de escala são apresentadas na barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TickStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O método ToString devolve uma cadeia que inclui o tipo e os valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the scroll box on the track bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor numérico que representa a posição actual da caixa de deslocamento na barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: The Value property contains the number that represents the current position of the scroll box on the track bar.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Value contém o número que representa a posição actual da caixa de deslocamento na barra de controlar.

trans-unit.source: A numeric value that is within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum*> range.
trans-unit.target: Um valor numérico que esteja dentro do <> </> *> e <> </> *> intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 0.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Minimum*>. -or- The assigned value is greater than the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Maximum*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído é inferior ao valor de <> </> *>. - ou - o valor atribuído é superior ao valor de <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*> property of a track bar changes, either by movement of the scroll box or by manipulation in code.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>propriedade de uma barra de controlar as alterações, através do movimento da caixa de deslocamento ou manipulação no código.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar.Value*>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to update other controls when the value represented in the track bar changes.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para atualizar outros controlos quando o valor representados nas registar alterações de barra.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de mensagem do Windows.
